item.title: The blog opens ! Hooray !
item.content:encoded:
The blog opens ! Hooray !

Hooray Henrys are a new band.

Here is the blog where you will be able to keep an eye over the band's life. Let's celebrate the opening of the blog with the 1st Hooray Henrys' release on the Dead Rooster Records label we have created to record our songs.

The song is a cover of Hot Hot Heat's No, Not Now.

Comments

Hello your potes, Despite your funny faces, I try to listen the music you post, not not now, but it seems it doesn't work... I am a little bit disapointed, if you get it. I am your very first fan and, above all, your very first singer and I hope we will be able to soon listen to your own music ! — Coke, April 20th 2005

Thanks for your comment Coke. Comments are not restricted to blogger members only any more. — Dirty Henry, April 25th 2005

It's very good. — GG, Septembre 13th 2005
